about.title: About Syntesys
about.intro: Syntesys is a technology consulting firm focused on turning strategy into execution by aligning technology, processes, and governance to deliver sustainable and measurable results.
about.mission: We work closely with business leaders and organizations that need to make informed decisions, structure IT initiatives, and drive digital transformation with technical clarity, business alignment, and control.
highlights: Hands-on experience in IT, cloud, and digital transformation projects
Strategic perspective combined with high-level technical execution

signature.bio: a specialist in IT projects, cloud, and technology governance.
signature.experience: With over 25 years of experience, Rafael has led digital transformation, technology modernization, and IT governance initiatives across organizations such as IBM, Unicamp, JBS, Nextel, Rodonaves, MetLife, Grupo SER Educacional, Unimed Recife, Tecfy, Tecnoset and many other. He holds internationally recognized certifications including ITIL, PMP (PMI), ACP-PMI (Agile), and Scrum, and has a strong track record leading technical teams focused on consistent results.
